overview: A newlywed couple Ted and Lauren rent an old farm house to do a thesis on orbs and set up cameras, Strange ghostly noises and haunting occur at night. Ted sees video of Lauren, possessed and wandering the fields at night. When their roommate kills himself they decide to do a s√©ance to see what is haunting the house. Little do they know what they hear and fear is nothing they can pray away.
title: Encounter
